issue.title: [CF 1617] Add 'Pixel Glow' and 'Autocast Shine' to Activation Border options
issue.body:
These are two different types of button glows that exist within the default game that WeakAuras lets you use. Would be nice to see them brought to TMW as well.


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy | Imported from CurseForge issue #1617 | Raw
